name: Form Data
hint: Top-level form data from the document.

fields.name: File Type
fields.hint: This is constant across all documents.

fields.name: Due Amount
fields.hint: The amount remaining to be paid.

fields.name: Exporter Address
fields.hint: The complete address of the exporter, including street, city, state/province, postal code, and country.

fields.name: Exporter Name
fields.hint: The full registered name of the exporter.

fields.name: Incoterms
fields.hint: Standard Incoterms codes and descriptions (e.g., "FOB", "CIF", "EXW Dalian").

fields.name: Invoice Currency
fields.hint: The primary currency of the invoice (e.g., "USD", "EUR").

fields.name: Invoice Date
fields.hint: The date the invoice was issued, in its original format.

fields.name: Invoice Due Date
fields.hint: The date by which the invoice payment is due, in its original format.

fields.name: Invoice Number
fields.hint: The primary invoice number. Prioritize this if multiple numbers are present.

fields.name: Payment Terms
fields.hint: The agreed-upon payment terms (e.g., "Net 30", "Due on receipt").

fields.name: Pickup Date
fields.hint: The date goods were picked up or are scheduled for pickup, in its original format.

fields.name: Pickup Location Address
fields.hint: The full address of the pickup location.

fields.name: Pickup Location Name
fields.hint: The name of the pickup location.

fields.name: Remittance Address
fields.hint: The complete address for sending payment, typically found under "Remit To" or "Bank Details".

fields.name: Remittance Name
fields.hint: The name of the entity to whom payment should be remitted.

fields.name: Steamship Line No
fields.hint: The steamship line number or booking reference.

fields.name: Sub Total
fields.hint: The sum of all line item amounts

fields.name: Total Amount
fields.hint: The grand total of the invoice

fields.name: Total Quantity
fields.hint: The total quantity of all items on the invoice.

fields.name: Total Tax
fields.hint: The total tax amount applied to the invoice.

fields.name: Total Vat
fields.hint: The total VAT amount applied to the invoice.

fields.name: Volume Uom
fields.hint: The unit of measure for volume (e.g., "CBM", "CFT").

fields.name: Voyage Number
fields.hint: The voyage or flight number.

fields.name: Weight Uom
fields.hint: The unit of measure for weight (e.g., "KG", "LBS").

fields.name: Bill To Name
fields.hint: The name of the entity to whom the invoice is billed.

fields.name: Bill To Address
fields.hint: The complete address of the billing entity.

fields.name: Commodity
fields.hint: The general description of the goods being shipped.

fields.name: Commodity Code
fields.hint: The code associated with the commodity.

fields.name: Customer Address
fields.hint: The complete address of the customer.

fields.name: Customer Id
fields.hint: The customer's unique identification number.

fields.name: Customer Name
fields.hint: The full registered name of the customer.

fields.name: Customer Po
fields.hint: The customer's purchase order number. Look for "Customer PO", "PO Number", "Buyer Ref.", "Customer Reference","Reference".

fields.name: Customer Address Recipient
fields.hint: The specific recipient name at the customer's address if different from customer_name.

fields.name: Customer Tax Id
fields.hint: The customer's tax identification number.

fields.name: Hs Code
fields.hint: The Harmonized System (HS) code applicable to the primary commodity or document if not item-specific.

fields.name: Ship To Address
fields.hint: The complete address where the goods are to be shipped.

fields.name: Ship To Name
fields.hint: The name of the entity at the ship-to address.

fields.name: Vendor Address
fields.hint: The complete address of the vendor (if different from exporter).

fields.name: Vendor Name
fields.hint: The full registered name of the vendor (if different from exporter).

fields.name: Vendor Address Recipient
fields.hint: The specific recipient name at the vendor's address.

fields.name: Temperature
fields.hint: The required temperature for the shipment, including unit (e.g., "2-8 Â°C", "Ambient").

name: Charge Details
hint: A list of individual products or services on the invoice. Each object represents one line item.

fields.name: Amount
fields.hint: The total amount for this specific line item.

fields.name: Country Of Origin
fields.hint: The country where the goods for this line item originated.

fields.name: Currency
fields.hint: The currency of the unit price/amount for this specific line item, if specified.

fields.name: Date
fields.hint: A date associated with this line item if specific (e.g., service date).

fields.name: Description
fields.hint: A detailed description of the product or service.

fields.name: Hs Code
fields.hint: The Harmonized System (HS) code for this specific line item.

fields.name: Part Number
fields.hint: The manufacturer's part number for this item.

fields.name: Po Number
fields.hint: A purchase order number specific to this line item if different from the document-level PO.

fields.name: Product Code
fields.hint: A specific product code or SKU for this item.

fields.name: Quantity
fields.hint: The quantity of items in this line.

fields.name: Rate
fields.hint: The unit price or rate for this item.

fields.name: Sku
fields.hint: Stock Keeping Unit for the product.

fields.name: Tax
fields.hint: The tax amount applied to this specific line item.

fields.name: Uom
fields.hint: The unit of measure for the quantity (e.g., "PCS", "Bags").

fields.name: Vat
fields.hint: The VAT amount applied to this specific line item.

fields.name: Volume
fields.hint: The volume of this specific line item.

fields.name: Weight
fields.hint: The weight of this specific line item.
